name: santa scraps - christmas cal bauble
notes:
christmas cal 2020
me and 6 other crochet designers have made a christmas bauble cal for this year. all patterns are free. go to instagram and check out the other designers profil to find the patterns. 

nov 23 - @littleaquagirl⁣⁣⁣
nov 26 - @lex_in_stitches⁣⁣⁣
nov 30 - @lespetitesmainsdekhuccay⁣⁣⁣
dec 4 - @tinycurl⁣⁣⁣
dec 7 - @lululovesthemoon⁣⁣⁣
dec 10 - @belleandgrace_hmc⁣⁣⁣
dec 14 - @crochetbykim

use hashtag #merryamichristmas to share your christmas baubles 



what you need for the santa scraps:
* crochet hook size 2,5 mm (13, b, 1)
* cotton yarn suitable for hook size bigger than 2,5 mm (or which one you use). i use 5 ply, fine yarn, hobbii rainbow 8/4 cotton yarn. you will need: white yarn 20 gram/0.7 oz , yellow yarn 5 gram/0.17 oz, black yarn 5 gram/ 0.7 oz, red yarn 5 gram/ 0.7 oz and grey yarn 5 gram/ 0.7 oz. 
* 2 x safety eyes in size 8 mm/ 0.31 inch. you can buy the safety eyes in my webshop www.crochetbykim.com.
* golden thread for hanging the toy to the christmas tree. about 15 cm/ 5.9 inches
* scissor
* needle
* stuffing about 15 gram/0.5 oz
